heisigStory: Better to picture what happens when you do not pay attention to your work in the kitchen. Here we see a blazing fire and an inattentive, yawning cook who let things get out of control.
koohiiStory1: Japanese cooking sometimes lacks fire, e.g., sashimi.
koohiiStory2: This character shows the difference between a cook and a chef: a chef prepares food with passion and love; a cook only stands there with a pan over a fire, with no passion and just yawning.
